segments.text: Tell me something about your Valentine's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , on that day , boys usually give roses to the sweet hearts and girls give them chocolate to return .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So romantic . Young people must have lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that is the holiday is hot , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2
